effect.u_message: You wrap yourself up in a glamour.

false_effect.u_message: You need to be among nature to disguise yourself within nature.

effect.u_message: The glamour disguising you fades.
Your weapon kindles into white-gold flame.

false_effect.u_message: Fires of Bealtaine requires a weapon to affect in order to take hold.
Your stretch your limbs and bounce on your heels.
After your actions you may not invoke the right of passage.

effect.u_message: You carefully slip through the cracks.

false_effect.u_message: You must be indoors to slip through the cracks.

then.u_message: You slip through the door and head straight home.

else.u_message: You must be unobserved to hurry home!

false_effect.u_message: You must be in a doorway to hurry home.

effect.title: What form will you be able to assume?
descriptions: You will be able to assume the form of a bat.
You will be able to assume the form of a raven.
You will be able to assume the form of a bear.
You will be able to assume the form of a deer.
You will be able to assume the form of a wolf.
You will be able to assume the form of a cougar.

effect.u_message: Your fingers lengthen as flaps of skin grow between them and as your legs shorten, you take to the air.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough mana to transform into a bat.

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and your fingers separate as you return to your previous form.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and warps as your fingers extend into wings and feathers burst from your skin as you take to the air.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough mana to transform into a raven.

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and your feathers vanish as you return to your previous form.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and expands as fur sprouts from your skin and your mouth and teeth lengthen.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough mana to transform into a bear.

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and contracts and you return to your humanoid form.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and warps as your fingers and feet fuse into hooves and majestic antlers sprout from your head.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough mana to transform into a deer.

effect.u_message: Your body shifts and contracts and you return to your humanoid form.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your nose pushes out into a muzzle as you fall forward on all fours and let out a snarl.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough mana to transform into a wolf.

effect.u_message: Your fur disappears and you walk once again on two legs.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: Your nose pushes out into a muzzle and whiskers sprout from it as you fall forward on all fours and let out a growl.

false_effect.u_message: You don't have enough mana to transform into a cougar.

effect.u_message: Your fur and whiskers disappear and you walk once again on two legs.

//: This is necessary because calling u_deactivate_trait from within the trait EoC does not work

effect.u_message: A thick fog begins to rise.

false_effect.u_message: You release your command over the fog and it begins to disperse.

effect.u_message: The thick fog begins to disperse.

false_effect.u_message: The weather is too cold for you to control it.
The weather is too cold for you to control it.

effect.u_message: The sky explodes in a frenzy of lightning!

false_effect.u_message: You need a heavy rainstorm to agitate it into lightning.

effect.u_message: You dreams have revealed to you a secret of forging moon's tears.
